about_the_game:
CHECK OUT OUR UPCOMING GAME

About Run Prop, Run!

Run Prop, Run! is a multiplayer hide'n'seek game. It is inspired by the classic Prop Hunt mod where players must disguise themselves as an object in the scenery to avoid detection by a hunter.



Run Prop, Run! can have up to 12 players and begins with one Hunter trying to catch other hiding Prop players.



As each Prop gets caught, they will turn into Hunters making it more and more difficult for the remaining Props to survive the hunt.
To help the Props survive, they are given the ability to transform into any object in the stage so they can better blend into the environment.



When a Hunter captures a prop, it turns it into a Hunter. Start 1 Hunter VS 11 Props, and finish with up to 11 Hunters VS 1 prop!
It's not just Prop Hunt Hide and Seek. There's a lot of mechanics revolving around platforming, abilities, and strategy!
detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OUR UPCOMING GAME

About Run Prop, Run!

Run Prop, Run! is a multiplayer hide'n'seek game. It is inspired by the classic Prop Hunt mod where players must disguise themselves as an object in the scenery to avoid detection by a hunter.



Run Prop, Run! can have up to 12 players and begins with one Hunter trying to catch other hiding Prop players.



As each Prop gets caught, they will turn into Hunters making it more and more difficult for the remaining Props to survive the hunt.
To help the Props survive, they are given the ability to transform into any object in the stage so they can better blend into the environment.



When a Hunter captures a prop, it turns it into a Hunter. Start 1 Hunter VS 11 Props, and finish with up to 11 Hunters VS 1 prop!
It's not just Prop Hunt Hide and Seek. There's a lot of mechanics revolving around platforming, abilities, and strategy!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04 or more recent
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Vulkan drivers for the best experience. Also compatible with Mesa drivers.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04 or more recent
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Vulkan drivers for the best experience. Also compatible with Mesa drivers.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra 10.12 or more recent
  • Processor: i5 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 / AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sierra 10.12 or more recent
  • Processor: i5 3.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970/AMD 390 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Run Prop, Run! - Puropu Pursuit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD FX series or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 / AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 4650 / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970/AMD 390 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews:
“"We laughed and had a great time taking turns hunting each other down or being the props"”
Marooners' Rock
short_description: Run Prop, Run! is a 12-player prop hunt hide & seek game with platforming, skills, and crazy game rules! Join the hunters army to seek props, or disguise as random objects to deceive the others!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
